tool_description: Matches comedy materials with audience preferences to optimize setlist composition and predict reception success rates.

audience_preferences.description: Audience preference scores for different comedy styles

sensitivity_warnings.description: Topics or styles to avoid for this audience

error_messages: Mismatched array lengths: audience_preferences array length must match expected preference categories.
Invalid preference scores: All preference scores must be between 0 and 100.
Invalid performance duration: Duration must be between 5 and 120 minutes.
Empty material categories: At least one material category must be provided.
No suitable matches: No materials found that meet audience preferences and sensitivity requirements.
usage: Input categorized materials, audience preference scores, and sensitivity warnings to receive optimized material recommendations with match confidence scores.

match_scores.description: Confidence scores for each recommended material (0-100)

avoid_materials.description: Materials that should be avoided for this audience

optimal_order.description: Suggested performance order for recommended materials
